data.name: webinale – the holistic web conference
data.description: webinale is the conference for digital professionals, trendsetters and makers in the World Wide Web- it’s the optimal crossover platform for knowledge transfer, inspiration and exchange of experience across all industries.

relatedRecords.name: DroidconKE
relatedRecords.description: Droidcon is a global conference focused on the engineering of Android applications. Droidcon provides a forum for developers to network with other developers, share techniques, announce apps and products, and to learn and teach.
